markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 16"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Frenzy Oil](/Equipment.aspx?ID=552)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Age of Ashes</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Contact" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=37" />
<trait label="Poison" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=126" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #149: Against the Scarlet Triad](/Sources.aspx?ID=14) pg. 78</row>

**Price** 1,500 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This oil, which is pressed from [vrock](/Monsters.aspx?ID=100) spores and mixed with a combination of acacia ash and thistle seeds, seeps into the skin of living creatures, initially inspiring irritability that unpredictably manifests as berserk rage.

 **Saving Throw** DC 37 Fortitude; **Onset** 1d6 minutes; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds; **Stage 1** 4d6 mental damage, [quickened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=32), attack nearby creatures as if [confused](/Conditions.aspx?ID=5) (1 round); **Stage 2** 6d6 mental damage, attack nearby creatures as if confused (1 round); **Stage 3** 8d6 mental damage, [fatigued](/Conditions.aspx?ID=15), attack nearby creatures as if confused (1 round)

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Frenzy Oil
